content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[VanArsedl_Transactions]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[VanArsedl_Transactions]
( 
	[TransactionID] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[CustomerID] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[MovieID] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[RentalDate] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[ReturnDate] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[RentalCost] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[LateFee] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[RewindFlag] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[CreatedDate] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[UpdatedDate] [varchar](500)  NULL
)
WITH (DATA_SOURCE = [AzureDataLakeStore], LOCATION = N'/Raw/VanArsdelLtd/dboTransactions', FILE_FORMAT = [csv_delimitedNew], REJECT_TYPE = VALUE, REJECT_VALUE = 0 )
GO
